content.html: I get it. People need to take work to feed themselves and their families, especially underrepresented and marginalised folks. And those reasons are not immediately obvious to the drive-by dunkers. But I have no pride for what I did either.
content.value:
I get it. People need to take work to feed themselves and their families, especially underrepresented and marginalised folks. And those reasons are not immediately obvious to the drive-by dunkers.

But I have no pride for what I did either.
